text:
(Added by Ord. 17-62, App. 1/17/62; amended by Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97)
SEC. 10.162.  RESERVED.
Editor's Note:     Ord. 249-07 repealed former Sec. 10.162, which pertained to Cash Revolving Funds – Department of Elections; $500 (may also be used, with the approval of the Controller, to reimburse election judges, inspectors and other poll workers). 
(Amended by Ord. 476-81, App. 9/21/81; Ord. 298-97, App. 7/25/97; repealed by Ord. 249-07, File No. 071329, App. 11/7/2007)

heading.catch_text: CASH REVOLVING FUNDS – RECREATION CAMP MATHER; $750.
